abstract: Charles Kinsey says he was shot in leg by police officers in North Miami, Fla, while trying to calm patient with autism who had run away from group home where he works; Kinsey, who is black, was photographed on his back with hands in air and says he tried to explain situation to police officers.
lead_paragraph: Video shows Charles Kinsey, a 47-year-old black man, on the ground with his hands in the air before he was wounded in the leg.

headline.main: North Miami Police Officers Shoot Man Aiding Patient With Autism
headline.print_headline: Police in Florida Shoot and Wound Man Aiding Patient

snippet: Video shows Charles Kinsey, a 47-year-old black man, on the ground with his hands in the air before he was wounded in the leg....
